Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000056>この近くにベルデ草が 生えてるはずよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000056>There should be Belde Grass growing around here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000057>この近くっていっても、 この辺りは、草ひとつ 生えてないぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000057>Not to burst your bubble, but there doesn't seem to be a single blade of grace anywhere.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000058>もう少し、向こうの方へ 行ってみるか。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000058>Let's try looking a little further up.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400005b>おや!? あんたたちは収容所で…… 覚えてないか？ 俺だよ、収容所で 一緒に出してもらったイゴルだ。 あん時は本当に世話になった！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400005B>Huh?! You're the people from the prison... Do you remember me? I'm Igor. You guys helped me escape from my cell. You sure saved my skin back there!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400005c>で、こんなところで 何をしてるんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400005C>So, what brings you to a place like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400005d>薬の原料になるという ベルデ草を採りに来たんだが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400005D>We're looking for Belde Grass because it's used in a medicine we need.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400005e>すると、鎮魂錠を作るつもりか？ それだったら、ラジルダのイーガって おっさんのところに行けばいい。 喜んで分けてくれるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2400005E>Are you planning on making a Requiem Pastille? If that's the case, then you should speak to Eaga over in Razilda. He'd be happy to give you some.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400005f>……イーガさんのところには もう行ってきました。
<voice:24000060>一度は鎮魂錠を もらえそうだったんだが…… ガジュマを救うためだと わかったとたんに断られた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000060>At first, he was willing to give us the medicine, but the moment he found out it was for a Gajuma, he turned on us.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000061>……なるほど、そういう事か。 そいつは気の毒にな。
<voice:24000062>もしかして、救おうとしてる ガジュマっていうのは あの収容所で会った、 あんたらの仲間のでかい旦那か？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000062>By any chance, is your Gajuma friend that big fella who was with you guys back in the prison?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000064>そうか…… よし、ここは俺がひと肌脱ごう。 鎮魂錠を手配してやるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000064>All right. Shouldn't be too hard. I'll see to it that you get a Requiem Pastille.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000066>ああ、あんたらには借りがあるからな。 ラジルダの宿屋で待っていてくれ。 鎮魂錠を持っていく。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000066>Yeah, I owe you guys after all. Wait for me at the inn in Razilda. I'll bring the medicine to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000067>それは助かるが…… どうやって手に入れるつもりだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000067>That would be a great help, but how are you going to get your hands on some?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:24000068>心配するな。 イーガは俺の親父だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:24000068>Don't worry about that. Eaga's my old man.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2400006a>やったぜ!! やっぱ、 人助けはしとくもんだな!!
<voice:110000a0>金さえもらえば、 おまえらに用はなーい!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000A0>Now that I've gotten your money, I have no need for you anymore!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000a1>おまえらをぶっ飛ばして、 金目のモンはぜーんぶ いただくのさー!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000A1>I'm gonna blow you all to smithereens, then I'll take everything valuable that I can off of you! Take this!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000a8>バカか、おまえ…… 港が閉められてんのに 船が出るわけないだろー！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000A8>What, are you stupid...? With the harbor closed off, do you really think that a boat can get out to sea?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000ac>す、すいません…… いえその……ちょいとした 冗談といいますか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000AC>M-my sincerest apologies... Actually that was...what you’d call a prank...
<voice:110000B0>...I-I’ll put the money right here, sir...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000b1>す、すいません…… いえその……ちょいとした 冗談といいますか……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000B1>M-my sincerest apologies... Actually that was...what you’d call a prank...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000b3>あ、ありがたきお言葉…… すいませんでしたー!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000B3>T-Thank you for sparing me... Once again, I'm deeply sorry!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000b4>どうする？ 軍の船に潜り込むか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000B4>What should we do? Should we try to stow away onto a military ship?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000b5>いや……それも うまい手じゃないな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000B5>No...I don’t think that would be a good move for us either.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000b6>沖合いに停泊している船が 見えるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000B6>Do you not see the boats anchored right offshore?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000b8>軍の船が海上を封鎖している。 この状態では例え船を奪ったとしても、 不審な動きをすれば 砲撃されかねないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000B8>There's a military blockade out at sea. If we were to, say, steal a boat, it's likely that any suspicious movement on our part would be met with artillery.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000b9>そっか…… じゃあダメだね……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:110000B9>I see... Guess we’re outta luck then...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:110000ba>いったんミナールへ戻ろう。
<voice:11000149>海岸の巡回に来たら、 ガジュマの子供が来て……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000149>We were patrolling the beach and then some Gajuma kid came and...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100014b>おまえたちも早く逃げないと バ、バイラスが来るぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100014B>If you guys don't make a run for it, those Viruses are gonna get you!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100014d>遅かった!! 完全に暴走してる!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100014D>We're too late! He's completely lost control!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100014e>なぜ、バイラスがミーシャの周りに？ それも異なる種類のバイラスが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100014E>Why are there Virus around him? And more than one kind...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100014f>わかった。 あれは<Yellow>牙のフォルス<White>だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100014F>I've got it! He must have the <Yellow>Force of Fangs<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000151>バイラスを操るコトが できる能力だよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000151>He has the ability to control Virus.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000152>間違いない！ バイラスの群れの 中にいるのにミーシャが 襲われないのも説明がつく。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000152>There's no mistaking it! That explains why he can stand in the midst of them and not be attacked!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000153>このまま暴走が続けば、大量の バイラスが集まりかねない。 急ぐぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000153>At this rate, this area will become overrun with them. We have to act fast!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000156>……わたしは、わたしのせいで 誰かを不幸にしたくないから……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000156>...I don't want people to be upset because of me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000158>それに、その人を…… <Eugene>を倒すのは…… わたしだから……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000158>Moreover, the only one allowed to kill <Italics>him<NoItalics>...to kill Eugene... Is me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000159>気をつけて！ また来たよ!!
<voice:1100015f>……どうやら、暴走は 収まったようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100015F>It looks like his Force has calmed down.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000161>あなたは来ないほうがいい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000161>It would be better if you stayed where you are.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000162>あなたの言葉がミーシャの 触れてはいけない部分に触れた…… 今、あなたが来たら、 またミーシャが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000162>What you said to him struck a nerve that shouldn't have been struck. If you come near him now, Misha might...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000163>わたしは…… わたしは、ただ……
<voice:11000164>すいません、センセイ…… ぼく……また暴走しちゃいました……
<voice:11000165>いいのよ、ミーシャ…… それより大丈夫なの……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000165>It's alright, Misha... More importantly, how do you feel?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000166>ええ、大丈夫…… あんなコト言われたぐらいで、 暴走したぼくが悪いんですよね。 <Annie>さんの事情を聞いてたのに……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000166>I'm okay, I guess... It was my fault for getting worked up over a bunch of words. Especially knowing what <Annie>'s gone through...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000167><Annie>さん……ごめんなさい。 それから……助けてくれて、 ありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000167><Annie>...I'm sorry. Thank you for saving me.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000169>行きましょう、先生…… ぼく、つかれちゃった…… とっても眠いんです……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000169>Let's go, Doctor Curia. I'm tired... I could go for a nap.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100016a>……そうね、 休まなくちゃね。
<voice:1100016b>それでは、皆さん…… 失礼します。
<voice:1100016c>どんな理由があったにせよ、 ミーシャに対するあなたの言葉を 聞いていたら、ドクター・バースは きっとお嘆きになったでしょうね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100016C>No matter what your reasons were, if your father were alive to hear the things you said to Misha earlier, he would be ashamed of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100016e>私はあなたのお父様の講義を 受けた事がある。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100016E>Many years ago, I was his student.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1100016f>その時、ドクター・バースは 口癖のように何度もこう言ったわ。 「命に色はない」……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1100016F>Back then, Doctor Barrs was always drilling these words into us: "Life knows no color."

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000171>それがどういう意味なのか、 よく考えてごらんなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000171>I want you to think seriously about what that means.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000175>……<Eugene>、 ボクたちもいったん、 宿屋へ戻ろうよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:11000175><Eugene>, we should go back to the inn too.
<voice:11000177>...Let's rest for a bit before we head out.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:11000179>あなたたちには 関係ないわ。
<voice:3b000065><Veigue>のフォルスが 暴走してる!!

Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000067>...! Are you looking to get frozen?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00006c>ダメだ、聞こえてない！ 早く暴走を止めないと！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00006C>It's no use, he can't hear you! We need to get him under control!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00006d><Claire>、ここは私たちに任せて。 あんたは下がってて。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B00006D>Leave this to us, <Claire>. You need to stand back!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00006f>ううぅ…… うあああああああッ!!

Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000077>I give your strength... Three and a half stars...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b000079><Claire>…… 必ず、元に……身体を…… オレが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3B000079><Claire>... I promise, I'll... get your body... back to you...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3b00007a>……そんな…… いやぁぁぁぁぁッ!!
<speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
